lore: &8The custom type shown under the item's name.
custom_type.name: &6Custom Type

lore: &8The Base64 value of this player head,
base64.name: &6Base64 Texture

lore: &8The max amount of spawned mob this
spawner_spawn_count.name: &6Spawner Max Entity

lore: &8Either this item is enabled or not.
enabled.name: &6Item Enabled?

lore: &8Change the player's owner of this head.
skull_owner.name: &6Skull Owner

lore: &8If this is true, the custom item will
cant_enchant.name: &6Can't Enchant

lore: &8Hide the '&9Unbreakable&8' state in the item's lore.
hide_unbreakable.name: &6Hide Unbreakable (Flag)

lore: &8Change the entity type of this spawn egg.
egg_type.name: &6Egg Type

lore: &8Either this item should be marked as unbreakable,
&8so if this item has durability lost or not.
unbreakable.name: &6Unbreakable

lore: &8Change the Custom Model Data value of this item.
custom_model_data.name: &6Custom Model Data

lore: &8If this is true, the custom item will
cant_craft.name: &6Can't Craft

lore: &8Custom enchantment to apply to this item.
&8use &7/ic list enchantments&8 to get a full list of enchants.
enchantments.name: &6Enchantments

lore: &8Hide the effect in the item's lore
hide_effects.name: &6Hide Potion Effect (Flag)

lore: &8Hide the enchant present on the item.
hide_enchants.name: &6Hide Enchant (Flag)

lore: &8Change the leather color using both way:
&8  - Using the color name (ex: red, lime, orange, etc..)
leather_color.name: &6Leather Color

lore: &8NBT tag in the custom item. Require for
ic_tag.name: &6ItemCreator Tag

lore: &8Change the potion color using both way:

potion_color.name: &6Potion Color

rarity.name: &6Rarity

messages.parsing_enchantments: &eEnter in the chat the enchant formatted as 'ENCHANT:LEVEL' you want to add. Use &6/ic list enchantments&e to get a lit of them.
messages.custom_type: &eEnter in the chat the new custom type of this item
messages.wrong_color: &cUnknown color. It can either be its name (red, blue, etc..) or under 'RED, GREEN, BLUE' such as '255, 255, 255' for white.
messages.base64: &eEnter in the chat the Base64 value for this head. These value can be found on website like &6https://minecraft-heads.com/ &eor using &6Head Database&e.
messages.property_require_info: &cSome requirement are not here while changing this property:
enter_color: &eEnter in the chat the new color.
&eYou can input two type of color:
&6→ &eUsing the color name (ex: red, blue, lime, orange)
messages.skull_owner: &eEnter in the chat the owner's name.
messages.parsing_number: &eEnter in the chat the desired integer.
messages.wrong_potion_effect: &cThe potion effect format is wrong, it must follow '&4EFFECT DURATION AMPLIFIER&c' format.
messages.wrong_entity_type: &cWrong entity type! Use &4/ic list entities&c to get a list of them.
messages.parsing_potion_effects: &eEnter in the chat the potion effect, followed by the duration and the amplifier ('&6EFFECT DURATION AMPLIFIER&e')
messages.custom_item: &eEnter in the chat the custom item's ID.
messages.parsing_material: &eEnter, in the chat, the new material you want this item have.
messages.display_name: &eEnter in the chat the new custom name. (support color code)
messages.enter_item_id: &eEnter in the chat the new unique id of your item.
messages.parsing_lore: &eEnter in the chat the new line of the lore you want to add.
messages.item_already_exist: &cAn item with that id already exist.
messages.entity_type: &eEnter in the chat the entity type. Use &6/ic list entities&e to get a list of them.
messages.parsing_custom_model_data: &eEnter in the chat the new Custom Model Data integer.
messages.rarity: &eEnter in the chat the new rarity of your item.

give_info: &7Click here to give you the Custom Item;
